Name: StinkBugSmall
Notes: A purple bug enemy that charges towards the player. It can be defeated by Ground Pounding on its back. It drops three Star Bits in SMG1 and a single Coin in SMG2 when defeated. It can be frozen using the second player's pointer.

Obj_arg0.Name: Rotation Angle
Obj_arg0.Description: How many degrees it to the left and to the right right. Default is 180, which means it makes a full rotation.

Obj_arg1.Name: Movement Distance
Obj_arg1.Description: How far it moves when it charges at the player. Default is 1000.

Obj_arg7.Name: Disable Collision Mesh?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, its collision mesh will be disabled so that the player cannot stand on its back.

SW_DEAD.Description: Gets activated when it dies. If used, it won't drop any items.

SW_A.Description: If activated, it will start to fall down which causes it to be respond to gravity.

Player2Targetable.Description: Can be targeted and frozen by player 2.
